Posts.Content: Hi Lovelucca i have been on Letrozole for 4 weeks and the side effects are awful. Sickness joint pain and severe headaches. I was sick in the radiotherapy room today and the raduotherapist asked me how ling it had been going on. I told her about 3 weeks. She made ab appt with oncologist tommorrow at Charring Cross to see what they can do. I am on Prochlorperazine anti sickness tablets but they dont seem to work. Has anyone a solution to the sickness or any ideas how to lesson the naussea. Any answers gratefully received. Moses 111
Posts.Title: Sweats awful
